Had an error which prevents the game from saving. Contacted support about the issue and the crappy support which takes days to weeks just to reply you a common method which is to uninstall and reinstall the game -which obviously didn't help at all- and was straight up told to ask for a refund instead of helping out with the issue at hand. Uninstalling and asking for a refund. This game is a no-go.

UPDATE: The support don't do any refund and refuses to help out in resolving the problem, thus making the game stuck in my account.

Conclusion: Bad support and buggy game. DO NOT BUY.

I bought this game for about 4 people thinking I could have some asymteric game funtimes. Little did I expect it to be a horror game. Ques often take over 10 minutes where I have time to bond with friends. Then will crash so that we can have the common bond of failing as a group. The gameplay often leads much to be desired if you can even get to play the game.

I imagine most people won't get too far into that prospect. I hope things improve.

Ich kann dieses Spiel inzwischen absolut nicht mehr empfehlen!

Hab das Game nach einer langen Pause mal wieder spielen wollen, eine einzige Runde, gef√ºhlten 1.000 Neustarten weil ich im Ladebildschirm (mit dem DbD Logo) fest hing und Camper, hab ich es sofort wieder gelassen! 

(Warum die lange Pause? Weil ich keiner Lobby joinen konnte ohne im Ladebildschirm festzustecken, ich dachte das w√§re wegen dem neuen Patch so und wollte auf einen neuen warten, habe ich aber falsch gedacht, ist immer noch so und ich zocke in der Stunde lieber etwas anderes als dumm rumzuwarten!)

Grund? (die vor der langen Pause auch schon da waren)
Buggs, Unsichtbare Gegenst√§nde die einen aufhalten, OP Killer die dazu auch noch Campen, das Matchmaking f√ºr'n Arsch, VIEL zu lange Wartezeiten und vieles, vieles mehr!

Was machen die Entwickler dagegen?
Killer noch st√§rker patchen! DLC's raushauen um noch mehr Kohle abzugreifen? Sehe ich √ºberhaupt nicht ein, deshalb hab ich diese auch nicht gekauft, zumal die viel zu teuer sind! Ich sehe keine FORTSCHRITTE!

TI RITROVI DUE KILLER IN UNA PARTITA, MICHEAL MYERS CON LA MOTOSEGA E IL MANDRIANO COL TELETRASPORTO DELLA INFERMIERA...E COME SE NON BASTASSE SE PREMI PER SBAGLIO DUE VOLTE DI FILE IL TASTO M1 (PER CURARE O FARE I GENERATORI) IL TUO FOTTUTO PERSONAGGIO SI BLOCCHER√†, E NON CI SARA' NLLA CHE VOI PORACCI POTRETE FARE PER SALVARVI LE COSIDDETTE CHIAPPE
MADONNA SISTEMATE STI BUG

After playing this game in a ton of matches as both survivor and hunter, I have come to the conclusion that : It is horrible.

Pros : cool looking monsters and actually frightening jump scares for first 15 minutes.

Cons: this is an arena game made to look like a horror mmo.

The matchmaking system makes up half of my playtime, and the other half is being disconnected or rage quitting when the monster has latency 'issues' and just stutter steps over everything to kill you(or you have some terrible hacking problems that need to be addressed).

The game is not worth your time, and would have been fifty times better if you could kill or disable the hunter/monster and get away without turning on every generator.

Unless the hunter is a lame duck without a keyboard, you should in all intents and purposes lose.  You can't hide, you can't run, you can't even escape. GG

I loved playing the hunter until I realized the ranking system rewarded those who exploited traps by ignoring mechanics, and disconnected when they were going to lose(retaining their points and making you lose yours).

TLDR: not worth the f n time.

I would love to reccomend this game.  It has all the great tense moments and trilling escapes you expect from a survival horror game, but you had better have 5 people to play in a private match and you better no want to play online to actually get experience because the matchmaking in this game is awful!!!!!!  If you get into a game, and you actually try to get experience by yourself the game often glitches and you have to quit the game forfeiting your experience. So if they fixed matchmaking it would be a fantastic game, in its current state its is nearly unplayable.

Game is shit. people leaving during loading screen so you're stuck with 5 gens with only 3 people. While a game is loading up takes about 5 min. just to actually start & sometimes when burning an offering and you don't even get to play that game, that offering is gone. Only time I'd recommend is if you have a group of 5 friends and just playing private match.  I pref L4D2 over this game. c:


UPDATE:  This game is still trash cause of bs killer perks and such. But it has gotten better from when I last posted this review. I still pref L4D2 over this game.

Camper aber warum fragen sich viele? -Tolles Thema-
Ich bin mehr der reine Survival Gamer. Man hat st√§ndig Camper. Un jeder regt sich dr√ºber auf, findet es langweilig und unfair. Auf der einen Seite : JA es ist unfair und echt arschig. ABER mittlerweile kann ich die Killer verstehen! Ich spiele nun sch√∂n etwas l√§nger Killer Wraith. ICH camp NICHT weil ich es auch hasse. Jetzt wieder ABER... es ist meist garnicht machbar nicht zu campen, den sehr viele Survis sind wircklich echt arschig zu den Killern. Verarschen einen nur bei den Paletten so nach dem Motto ja geh durch... (Jeder wei√ü das man nicht durchgeht als Killer, wegen der schei√ü Bet√§ubung...) und dann st√§ndig drumrum laufen oder sie umkippen und andauernd dr√ºberspringen (selbe bei Fenstern) oder Kreise laufen um Autos, Reifen, Heuballen usw. Das macht als Killer einfach null Bock noch gro√ü weiter zu machen. Aus der Sicht mit Survi Meg muss ich sagen das mir manche Leute die ich dann halt so seh die das machen und dann am Hacken abgecampt werden mir nicht Leid tun. Haben sie selbst Schuld. Den wenn so jemand befreit wird geht der gleiche Mist ja wieder los. Da kann man nur die Augen rollen. Denn wer will sich st√§ndig so verarschen lassen? Denn dann fangen wohlm√∂glich die anderen des Teams auch noch damit an,das macht dann kein Spa√ü. (es gibt aber noch andere Probleme...) Und da wundert es mich NICHT das ein Gro√üteil der Leute campt! Was nat√ºrlich da wieder nicht sch√∂n ist, da andere die FAIR spielen dann auch mit abgecampt werden... Noch schlimmer sind Disconnecter die, wenn man sie hat einfach raus gehen... (manchmal gibts extrem Lag, wenn sie dann raus sind kann mans ja noch verstehen) 
Ich camp weiterhin NICHT weils schei√üe is un ich drauf selbst ja auch kein Bock hab, denn das kann ja jeder. Aber ich bitte echt die Survis st√§ndig so die Killer so zu verarschen... Das ist einfach der Grund warum viele Killer einfach campen! Weils dennen selbst aufn Sack geh...
Man kann sich jetzt noch weiter streiten √ºber das Thema ¬¥¬¥campen¬¥¬¥ aber das sind halt meine sehr h√§ufigen Beobachtungen die ich inGame gemacht hab, wies dann halt zum campen kommt
 -Ich kann die Killer verstehen- Ende der Durchsage 
- Empfehlung Ja/Nein : -
-Bugs: der nervigste von allen - Ladebildschirm der h√§ngen bleibt- meist nur durch Taskmanager zu schlie√üen
- Laggt manchmal noch *nervt* und die Camper bzw. nervigen Survis, Server getrennt, Und dem warscheinlich v√∂llig SINNLOSEM Reportsystem dann erstmal leider ein NEIN
!! Spiel das Game seit es raus ist und seitdem das Programm EASY ANTI CHEAT mit drin ist l√§uft es halt nicht mehr so super wie fr√ºher...!!

Dead by Daylight, un coinvolgente gioco che mischia Horror con Cooperazione. La modalit√† di gioco √® semplice, consiste nel fuggire dal mostro per poi scappare attraverso due cancelli. Il mostro vi dar√† la caccia e voi dovrete, prima di farvi catturare, riparare i generatori elettrici nella mappa per poi fuggire da 2 cancelli alle estremit√† di essa. Se per esempio siete in 4 sopravvissuti contro 1 mostro dovrete attivare 5 generatori, se invece siete 3 sopravvissuti dovrete attivare 4 generatori e cos√¨ via. C'√® anche uno stile di level up molto interessante, nel cui ti fa sbloccare varie abilit√†, accessori ed equipaggiamenti che si potranno poi aggiungere sul proprio personaggio. La grafica √® abbastanza bella. Per√≤ il Matchmaking √® fatto molto male, si possono impiegare dai 30 secondi ai 10 minuti per trovare 1 Partita! Ci sono sopratutto TANTISSIMI bug che gli sviluppatori si ostinano a non risolvere, dai bug grafici, a quelli del gameplay, a quelli del matchmaking. Sconsiglio PER ORA l'acquisto di questo gioco fino alla risoluzione di tutti i bug, dato che gli sviluppatori continuano a pubblicare DLC su DLC senza pensare a risolvere i bug. Spero che questa recensione vi sia piaciuta. Buona Fortuna contro il Mostro!

Franchement, je ne le recommande pas .
Il y a encore quelques mois, tout fonctionnait parfaitement (malgr√© quelques lags sans importance), et c'√©tait nickel.
Maintenant, le jeu est truff√© de bugs. 
J'ai environ 173 h de jouer, dont 50 environ ce mois, dont 40 heures de bug, √† essayer de lance une partie, sans jouer.


Il y a tellement de bugs que je peux en faire une liste !  : 
1) Quand tu joues, des fois, malgr√© ta bonne connexion et celle du tueur, tu te tp ( et parfois bien derri√®re toi quand le tueur te suit) ; 
2) tu veux lancer une game, tu dois d√©co-reco ( 30 fois d affil√© de pr√©f√©rence)
3) des fois tu te retrouveshors map, genre t es sur un crochet et tu voles dans ... bah dans le vide en fait ! ; 
4) tu as marqu√© "pr√™t" dans la partie etc, ca va se lancer , et l√†... surprise, on te vire de la partie ! 

Et encore plein d'autres ! 

Maintenant des "petits" d√©tails encore ! : 
-matchmaking de merde, tu commences le jeu t es contre un rang 1, super.. et un peu plus loin quand tu connais contre un rang 20.. c'est wtf mais t aura toujours des diff√©rences de niveau ENORME ; 
- quand qqun quitte pendant le chargement, tu peux te retrouver solo dans la game , alors tu perds des points (evidemment), 
- non seulement les joueurs peuvent quitter( enfin je pense que c est le jeu qui les fait quitter a force), mais en plus le tueur lui aussi donc tu perds des points ; 
- dois-je parler des avantages enormes des tueurs ? Oui parce que maintenant, la notion de survivant comment a perdre son sens ! 
- et le pire, le pire du pire, c'est qu'il existe des cheats ! donc genre le tueur sait exactement ou tu es ! 

Bref a part ca , le jeu est genial, bon graphismes, bonne ambiance, bon style de jeu etc... MAIS ces probl√®mes font que t as juste envie de te faire rembourses, parce qu avoir mis (avec les MAJ) environ 35 euros pour laguer sachant que tout ce qu ils savent faire est de commercialiser des fringues pour tes persos .. c'est moyen. 

S'ils ecoutaient leur communaut√© ce serait vachement mieux.

Perso, j'veux juste me faire rembourser, ca fait une heure et demi que je "joue" , oui car j'ai jou√© deux games et le reste (c'est √† dire 1h10) je me suis amus√©e √† deco/reco, une vraie perte de temps.


Sur ce, j espere que le jeu ira en s'am√©liorant, en attendant ne l achetez surtout pas, a moins que vous soyez maso.

Dead by Daylight √© um jogo que superou minhas espectativas, principalmente pelo fato de que me falaram mal do jogo, disseram-me coisas como "Ah √© cheio de bugs", "N√£o funciona corretamente", "Mal otimizado", por√©m o jogo √© excelente, principalmente para um jogo na vers√£o 1.3.1(vers√£o que eu comecei a jogar), o que as pessoas n√£o entendem que raramente um jogo que n√£o tem um enorme fiador, dificilmente √© lan√ßado sem um ou outro bug ou falta de otimiza√ß√£o, calma ai gente n√£o √© a Rockstar, Blizzard ou Valve, por exemplo, fazendo o jogo, n√£o foram gastos 200 milh√µes para fazer o jogo.

E com a experiencia de atualmente 148 horas de jogo, me fez perceber que os unicos bugs que aparecem no jogo s√£o na tela inicial, e durante a escolha da posi√ß√£o que voc√™ quer jogar(Be a Survivor ou Be a Killer), que as vezes buga e voc√™ fica preso em um looping, mas isso √© f√°cilmente arrumado reiniciando o jogo ou reiniciando a Steam.

Uma coisa que me deixou desapontado √© o jogo n√£o ter um servidor fixo, o que faz com que algumas partidas fiquem com a lat√™ncia(ms) alta pois o host da partida √© o Killer, que muitas vezes ou √© de uma regi√£o longe como Am√©rica do Norte, Europa Ocidental ou Oriental, ou Oriente mesmo, o que te leva muitas vezes a abandonar o Lobby e procurar outro, mas n√£o √© algo que atrapalhe tanto meu julgamento sobre o jogo.

O jogo √© muito bom em praticamente todos os aspectos, os sobreviventes jogam em terceira pessoa o que d√° certa vantagem sobre o assassino, ja que voc√™ pode girar a camera e n√£o apenas ficar preso no que esta fazendo(geralmente reparando os geradores, que s√£o os objetivos principais do jogo), e ver o assassino antes que eles os vejam e se mover sorrateiramente para longe dali sem ser visto e tendo no√ß√£o de onde se encontra o perigo.

A vis√£o em primeira pessoa do assassino o atrapalha um pouco na hora de procurar os sobreviventes mas a velocidade dos assassinos compensa isso, pois eles s√£o moderavelmente mais r√°pidos que os sobreviventes, fazendo com que os sobreviventes sejam o mais silencioso possivel e os mais astutos na hora de utilizar o mapa a seu favor para atrasar ou despistar os assassinos, fora que os assassinos com suas caracteristicas √∫nicas conseguem mais vantagem ainda, sendo colocando armadilhas, desenhos m√°gicos ou utilizando de motosseras para conseguir surpreender e pegar os sobreviventes.

Outra coisa sensacional sobre o jogo, que me surpreendeu, √© que cada sobrevivente ou assassino tem seu pr√≥prio kit de habilidades(perks e/ou itens nos casos dos assassino) exclusivos os tornando melhores que os outros em certos aspectos, como, por exemplo, a sobrevivente Meg que corre ligeiramente mais r√°pido que os outros personagens sem utilizar de qualquer adicional ou o assassino The Shape que tem 3 n√≠veis, e em cada n√≠vel ganha algum atributo a custo de perder outros, em seu n√≠vel 1, ele √© inauditivel a longa e a m√©dia distancia, o que na maioria das vezes resulta em sustos e surpresas, e em seu n√≠vel 3 fica extremamente r√°pido e derruba os sobreviventes com apenas 1 ataque.

Cont√©m uma variedade grande de mapas, e esses mapas, principalmente os mais antigos(Autohaven Wreckers, Coldwind Farm e The Macmillian States) tem v√°rias vers√µes do mesmo mudando a forma com que voc√™ tem que jogar, pois alguns tem mais ganchos, menos ganchos, geradores em locais diferentes, tem mais espa√ßos de campo aberto, menos e assim por diante, testando ao limite suas habilidades de sobrevivencia e de investiga√ß√£o de rastros e vestigios deixados pelos sobreviventes.

Os itens e add-ons no jogo s√£o outra coisa que me deixaram impressionado, tendo v√°rios n√≠veis e utilidades, e sendo variados, desde mapas, e caixas de ferramentas at√© chaves que abrem uma porta secreta para voc√™ sair de fininho pelas costas do assassino enquanto ele acha que voc√™ vai consertar os geradores e sair pela porta da frente.

O jogo √© incrivel, eu super recomendo, v√£o ser os R$36,99 mais bem gastos que voc√™s ir√£o gastar!

I bought this game in its earlier days (December 2016). Originally, Dead by Daylight is an asymmetrical killer game, where a killer is chasing you until you'll die. The survivors have to repair at most 5 generators, then they‚Äôre able to escape. While repairing gens a killer is hunting you thought the entire map. When all gens have been repaired, you can escape thought the exit doors. It‚Äôs simple or?

Yes, it is but ‚Ä¶ When I started playing as a survivor in December 2016 I thought this game is amazing but after a few months the game gets, I don‚Äôt know how I should say ‚Ä¶ weirder, crazier xD.

When I was in the higher ranks the killers started camping and tunnelling. I recognized that the community is filled with ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•s, survivors AND killers. When you‚Äôre playing Dead by Daylight it doesn‚Äôt matter how you‚Äôll play, well or badly. There might be a person who is playing as good as a pro, and he lets you know how to play. The community is the first problem. Killers are crying because of decisive strike (a perk where you can escape from the killer‚Äôs grasp) but you can counter this perk in 6 different ways ‚Ä¶ Wtf and the whole killer community of this game is crying because of ONE ‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•‚ô•ING PERK? 

The second problem are the developers. I understand that perks and the game have to be balanced but ‚Ä¶ The game was balanced when the doctor was released. Then the development of the game decreased. The developers are just reinforcing the killers and the survivors gets weaker and weaker and weaker. It‚Äôs possible to influence the survivors‚Äô internet when lag switching as killer to get an advantage. Servers might be a solution! 

The third problem are the community managers and the balancing/performance of this game. The community managers do NOT think about your problems. If you have one, hahahaha ‚Ä¶ You‚Äôll still have it because no one will help you. (Dead by Daylight had a bug where you lost all your advance and WHEN, but just WHEN they were helping you, you had to wait at least 5 months.) The balancing IS a big problem. I said in a sentence before that killers are able to influence your internet and I think it‚Äôs an absurdity in a game. While chasing it‚Äôs not as impossible as you may think but sometimes you‚Äôre sticking into a tree or in the grass. A new bug is that you can‚Äôt move when the game begins, so you have to disconnect and you get punished for it. Story of today: I had a killer with 800+ hours in the game and he was hacking (speed hack) and a friend got banned because he left more than 20 times because of face camping killers ‚Ä¶ Is just amazing how the developers are impressing me.

You might heard about the new shop ‚Ä¶ Just look in ‚Ä¶ It‚Äôs just unbelievable. I did the mistake and I bought outfits there for at least 35‚Ç¨ (don‚Äôt know the US/GB prices) and it was just a mistake. I spend 35‚Ç¨ in 8 clothes and I can‚Äôt put them on in real life :(

To sum up I can say Dead by Daylight is funny to play with friends and when you have aggressions it‚Äôs a playground for you :> I won‚Äôt stop playing yet, but when I‚Äôve found another game ‚Ä¶ bb and gg Dead by Daylight.
